definition: email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]

sentences.english: Tomorrow I am going to teach my grandma (on my mother's side) how to send email.
sentences.chinese: 聽日我會教我婆婆點樣發電郵。

sentences.english: You can buy roses from a garden center or by mail order.
sentences.chinese: 你可以從園藝中心或通過郵購買到玫瑰。

sentences.english: Is by far the only country more than 2000 cities and counties to "Post" named after the city.
sentences.chinese: 是至今全國兩千多個縣市中唯一以“郵”命名的城市。

sentences.english: They're supposed to be here today but they're not in this morning's post.
sentences.chinese: 它們應該今天到的，但是早上的郵班裏沒有。

sentences.english: I've just come out to post some letters.
Please email us as to their disposal.
sentences.chinese: 請即來電郵告知，該貨物應如何處理。

sentences.english: Would you be kind enough to show me the way to the post office?
sentences.chinese: 請你告訴我去郵如何做虛擬充值局的路好嗎？

sentences.english: Please refer to Costa Cruises Brochure for terms & conditions.
sentences.chinese: 報名前請參閱歌詩達郵輪行程書內之各條款及規則。

sentences.english: Please tell me your address, I want to mail a fried chicken leg to you.
sentences.chinese: 請告訴我你的通訊處，我想給你郵一個炸雞腿。

sentences.english: If you send by courier service, the letter will reach sooner.
sentences.chinese: 如果你以快郵服務來寄，信件會比較快到達。

sentences.english: Ship your packages using your own packaging material along with this Priority Mail decal.
sentences.chinese: 郵寄包裹時用你自己的包裝物並加貼此優先郵標籤。

sentences.english: Thank you again for your email and wish you all the best!
sentences.chinese: 再一次謝謝你的來郵並祝你一切順利。

definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
to sign up/to enter one's name/to apply/to register/to enroll/to enlist
